Unsupported custom messages Translated by Tencent Cloud Chat
//// %s applies for access to the microphone In order for you to send voice messages, make video and audio and video calls, please allow us to access the microphone. Allow microphone access in Settings->Apps->%s to use voice messages, video cameras, and audio and video calls as normal %s applies for camera permission In order for you to take photos or videos to send to contacts, and to make video calls, please allow us to access the webcam.
Allow camera access in Settings->Apps->%s to use the photo, video and video calling functions as normal
%s applies for storage permission In order for you to save photos and videos to your device, please allow us to write photos and videos to your device.
Allow storage access in Settings->Apps->%s to use the function of saving photos and videos normally
